# The `file_magic` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/file-magic">file&#95;magic</a> - An &quot;enum class&quot; enumeration of file types based on magic (the first N bytes of the file). <a href="#details">More...</a>
